abstract: When G.E. announces first-quarter results on Friday, they could show that the world goes pretty well, even if the American economy could be going better.
snippet: When G.E. announces first-quarter results on Friday, they could show that the world goes pretty well, even if the American economy could be going better.
lead_paragraph: AS General Electric goes, so goes the world, more or less.

headline.main: What G.E.’s Profit Says About the Planet
headline.print_headline: What G.E.’s Profit Says About The Planet
